feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.74
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1239
  • Share an Album to Multiple Contacts at Once by @ashilkn https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1116
  • Add support for viewing HEIC images with proXDR by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1171
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.75
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused global keys by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1309
  • Allow for configuring a custom server by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1302

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.74...photos-v0.8.75

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.81
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change share page copy by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1323
  • Perf test on app init by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1366
  • Allow manual upload of videos when global video upload is disabled by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1384
  • Fix active plan highlight by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1388
  • Use sqlite async for fetching all files for search by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1391
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1282
  • Use sqlite async for fetching files for gallery by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1397
  • Minor fixes for semantic search by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1412
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1420
  • Upgrade flutter by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1434

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.75...photos-v0.8.81

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.94
entry.content:
Release Notes ✨

  • Cast slideshows of albums to any screen
  • Favorite and organize shared photos
  • Enhancements around Android widgets, background sync, search screen, ...
  • Material You components
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

Changelog

  • Upgrade connectivity_plus pkg by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1450
  • Use modificationTime as creationTime if it's lower than… by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1451
  • Search field fixes by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1464
  • pref: use sqlite_async for getFilesCreatedWithinDurations by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1478
  • Migrate from sqflite by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1483
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1482
  • Migrate use of WillPopScope to PopScope by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1473
  • perf: avoid unnecessary frame builds and computations when toggling full fullscreen when viewing a file by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1487
  • Use sqlite_async instead of sqlite3 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1489
  • Remove code related to sqlite3 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1490
  • Bump up to v0.8.83 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1494
  • Downgrade to Flutter v3.19.3 by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1495
  • Fix build failing in release workflow by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1497
  • Enable fav + add to album action for shared files by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1484
  • Bump version : 0.8.84+604 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1498
  • Increase loading iconSize + reduce padding by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1499
  • Restrict multipart upload to debug builds by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1500
  • Discard upload to deleted or others collection by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1516
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1520
  • Add feature flag plugin & use ente server to fetch flags. by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1524
  • Favorite button by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1526
  • Add Ente popup menu widget by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1562
  • Add an option to download multiple items by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1563
  • Add support for casting by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1556
  • Replace Isar with SQLite for storing CLIP embeddings by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1575
  • Log n/w when mobileBackUpIsDisabled and backup is happening by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1589
  • Request for ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION permission if not granted by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1600
  • Changelog by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1599
  • Bump up to v0.8.90 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1601
  • Fix BG task not getting killed by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1608
  • band aid fix for word gettng cut to next line in SelectionActionButton by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1607
  • Fix minor UI issues by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1588
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1538
  • Update changelog by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1609
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1617
  • Cast improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1623
  • Bump version 0.8.91+611 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1624
  • Disable auto-cast for iOS by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1633
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1630
  • Enable shared item action by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1638
  • Fix keepPhotos action for hidden albums by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1640
  • v0.8.94 by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1642

New Contributors

  • @BifrostTenmei made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1544

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.81...photos-v0.8.94

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.128
entry.content:
Release notes

  • Bug fixes & performance improvements

Changelog

  • [mob][photos] Fix issues with face thumbnail by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1523
  • [mob][photos] Generate face crops faster by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1542
  • [mob][photos] Remove unnecessary optional parameter by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1543
  • [FEAT] Resumable Multipart Upload by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1406
  • [mob] Keep fetching embeddings till no embedding is returned by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1709
  • Revert "Move padding within to increase tap-able area" by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1712
  • [mob][photos] Bump up to v0.8.95 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1722
  • [mob] Minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1724
  • Fix failing workflow for photos internal release by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1723
  • [mob] Show progress for downloading of clip models by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1738
  • Mobile faces v0 by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1776
  • [mob] Fix bug during logout by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1800
  • Mobile face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1799
  • Ml fixes by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1812
  • [mob][photos] Small fix in index scheduling by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1813
  • [mob][photos] Bump by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1814
  • Face flag by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1818
  • [mob][photos] Bump by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1819
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1788
  • Upgrade to flutter 3.22.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1804
  • Face fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1823
  • [mob][photos] Use flutter 3.22 for internal build by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1824
  • Dart UI isolate fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1828
  • Dart UI isolate fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1829
  • [mob][photos] Fix infinite loading on searching by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1830
  • Face small improvements by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1839
  • Face wake by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1843
  • [mob] Use custom assetPickerTextDelegate to use en as default by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1844
  • [mob] Increase limit to 50 for adding asset from device by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1873
  • [mob][photos] Trigger send logs if app is stuck in spalsh screen for >= 15 seconds by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1796
  • Face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1885
  • Wrap add person name banner inside safeArea by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1887
  • [mob][photos] Fetch remote feedback before clustering by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1888
  • [mob][photos] Bump by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1889
  • [mob][photos] Migrate files db to sqlite async by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1802
  • [mob] Minor fixes in face by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1900
  • Revert "Upgrade to flutter 3.22.0 (#1804)" by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1901
  • [mob] Lint fix by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1902
  • [mob] Use same flutter version in all workflows by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1903
  • Tiny face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1906
  • Breakup cluster by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1917
  • [mob] Hide faceItemWidget from fileInfo if faceIndexing is disabled by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1918
  • [mob] Remove dead code by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1919
  • Last fixes by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1920
  • [mob][photos] Upgrade to flutter 3.22.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1933
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1938
  • Final beta face by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1944
  • [mob] Gracefully handle the case when app is stuck due to secureStore exception by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1916
  • Update mobile-release.yml by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1955
  • [photos] bump version 0.8.128+648 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1956

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.94...photos-v0.8.128
